name: rtfeedme
description: Test the real-time plugin by sending all the bricks in 'dataset' to AFNI.

inputs.description: List of datasets to send to AFNI, specified as paths to dataset files. Multiple datasets can be specified.
inputs.name: Datasets

inputs.description: Send data via TCP/IP to AFNI running on the specified computer system 'sname'. Default is the current system using shared memory. Use 'localhost' to send on the current system using TCP/IP.
inputs.name: Host

inputs.description: Inter-transmit interval in milliseconds. Default is to send data as fast as possible.
inputs.name: Inter-transmit interval

inputs.description: Send data in 3D bricks. Default is 2D slices.
inputs.name: Send in 3D

inputs.description: Set the interprocess communications buffer size in megabytes when using shared memory. Has no effect if using TCP/IP. Default is 1 MB; if set to 0, a 50 KB buffer is used.
inputs.name: Buffer size (MB)

inputs.description: Swap byte pairs before sending data.
inputs.name: Swap byte pairs

inputs.description: Send 'nz' as the value of nzz for debugging purposes.
inputs.name: NZ Fake

inputs.description: Send 'cmd' as a DRIVE_AFNI command. If 'cmd' contains spaces, it must be quoted. Multiple -drive options can be used.
inputs.name: Drive commands

inputs.description: Send 'sss' as a NOTE to the realtime plugin. Multiple -note options can be used.
inputs.name: Notes

inputs.description: Send value 'v' as the y-range for realtime motion estimation graphing.
inputs.name: Y-range for motion estimation graphing

author: AFNI Developers
